synthesis.synthesis_method: On-surface Chemical Vapor Deposition (CVD) and Annealing

steps.description: Polymerization and graphitization of 3,9 (10)-dibromoperylene (DBP) on a metal surface to form 5-AGNR.
Lateral fusion of the synthesized 5-AGNR into wider GNRs.

synthesis.notes: The resulting 5n-AGNR is a mixture containing mainly 10-AGNR and also non-negligible amounts of 5-AGNR, 15-AGNR, and 20-AGNR.
